text:
Anyone know of a good walkthrough for remote development? I've tried a bit of googling, but haven't found any good info.

I'm basically looking for the ability both to navigate and edit a remote file system but also to execute code on the remote machine (using its resources) over ssh

elements.text:
Anyone know of a good walkthrough for remote development? I've tried a bit of googling, but haven't found any good info.

I'm basically looking for the ability both to navigate and edit a remote file system but also to execute code on the remote machine (using its resources) over ssh

text: I tried something like that long ago but I never got it working, part of it because I feel julia-repl in emacs kind of annoying to work with. So what I do is edit via TRAMP and running on julia REPL via ssh. Here is the issue where I asked about it, I didn’t try most of the newest answers <https://github.com/tpapp/julia-repl/issues/61#issuecomment-721210118>
